about_the_game:
Magical, ethereal and epic, this music pack from TK.Projects will surely find a happy home in your fantastical land of fairytales! Brighten up your fantasy with these fully orchestrated tracks featuring lush, rich instrumentation. Music for battles, towns, markets, fields, dungeons, and more!

Features:

*25 BGM and 11 ME
*Full orchestral arrangements
*.OGG and .M4A Formats
*Royalty-free music for use in your game dev projects

Tracklist:

＜BGM＞
1. AoFM_BGM01_Opening
2. AoFM_BGM02_Battle1
3. AoFM_BGM03_Battle2

5. AoFM_BGM05_Boss2

11. AoFM_BGM11_Field_Town1

13. AoFM_BGM13_Field_Market
14. AoFM_BGM14_Field_Sea
15. AoFM_BGM15_Field_Sky
16. AoFM_BGM16_Field_Forest

19. AoFM_BGM19_Field_Ice
20. AoFM_BGM20_Sence_Motivation
21. AoFM_BGM21_Sence_Friendship
